archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Filter Specification (Application Interface)
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
The user supplies and removes small filter script in order to recieve a relevant subset of the alerts (10 alerts per visit limit, per the terms of service).
TBD: How do users upload their filters? What happens if the filter capacity of the system seems saturated? Do we provide a TBD method to validate the filter? Can users upload in offline mode only?
